title: 26: Fungi above & below ground, our microbiome, chicken homes & vines in the UK
subtitle: 26: Fungi above & below ground, our microbiome, chicken homes & vines in the UK
summary: Lots of fungi this month, both in the soils and for eating. We explore the parallels between the principles for healthy land and our own bodies. A young farmer introduces us to an experimental ‘pizza-shaped’ chicken enclosure and we hear how UK vineyards are working with the changing climates.
